messages.content: I am proud of hard working families and East pensioners. Despite all these improvements there is still much more to do.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improvements through our school rebuilding programme, NHS or more police officers on our streets.

Pensioners have had the wish for having free travel for OAPs and a bus almost on demand locally against pensioner fuel campaign victory. I know your Winter Fuel Allowance and Cold Weather Payments will be safe with him.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Both my Tory opponent, a City Banker, has already had a chance to get elected to Parliament in Manchester and Lancashire. My Lib Dem opponent is a councillor in Ely respected and has stood for Parliament outside Cambridgeshire FOUR times!

issues.education: Both Peter and I are governors at the same March school. I've seen first hand his commitment to fighting for the best education for our kids.
issues.environment: Peter helped me with my allotment problem; we need an MP who isn't afraid to get a fair deal at work hands dirty.

housing.content: Pensioners have had the wish for having free travel for OAPs and a bus almost on demand locally against pensioner fuel campaign victory.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m not a career politician. This is the first time I've ever stood for election and it's my chance I want to push for a fairer, more prosperous and safer North East Cambridgeshire and my joy to represent you.

endorsements.endorsement: Peter has supported several of our campaigns fighting for social and workers in Wisbech.
If you want someone who will stand up for the Minimum Wage and a fair deal at work he is the only choice.
Both Peter and I are governors at the same March school. I've seen first hand his commitment to fighting for the best education for our kids.
Peter helped me with my allotment problem; we need an MP who isn't afraid to get a fair deal at work hands dirty.

quotes.text: Peter has supported several of our campaigns fighting for social and workers in Wisbech.
If you want someone who will stand up for the Minimum Wage and a fair deal at work he is the only choice.
I've seen first hand his commitment to fighting for the best education for our kids.
We need an MP who isn't afraid to get a fair deal at work hands dirty.
